allow: Bash(do echo "=== SEED $seed ===" echo -e "look\\ntalk Town Elder\\naccept Elder''''s Request\\nbye\\ngo east\\ngo west\\ngo east\\ngo west\\ngo east\\ngo west\\ngo east\\ngo west\\ngo east\\ngo west\\nattack\\nattack\\nattack\\nattack\\nattack\\nquests")

Bash(1 <<'EOF'
look
map
go north
look
map
go south
go east
look
map
quit
EOF)
